1.title: The Secret Story
1.plot: It's time for camp! A summer of sun and adventure are in store for the six councilors of Camp Werriwee, formally known as Camp Moonstone. But something is lurking in the woodland surrounding the campsite. Something evil. But don't ask the councilors for the story of this unspeakable legend. It's a secret.

2.title: A Good Samaritan?
2.plot: After a day of shopping with her girlfriends, Paige McGuire returns to her car only to discover a flat tire. Unable to change it herself, and with zero phone reception, she is surprised when a handsome stranger arrives to assist her. But something isn't quite right with this Good Samaritan...

3.title: Confessions of a Serial Killer
3.plot: An overworked-underpaid police detective gets the shock of his life when he arrests the "Holiday Slayer", the person responsible for 12 grisly murders throughout the city. It's not the crimes that shock him the most. It's the confession.

4.title: The Clown Statue
4.plot: A babysitting gig at the Craven residence couldn't be easier for Amy Hunter. The two girls are perfect angels, even if one of them collects creepy clown figurines. And none are creepier than that large, full sized clown statue hiding behind the door...

5.title: The Halloween Party
5.plot: Every town has a haunted house, and what better way to spend Halloween than by throwing the most epic party in the rundown manor. But things get scary when one guest realizes that the stories about the old house are true. It is haunted. And that there's a ghost among them....

imdb.title: Tales of Terror
plot: _Tales of Terror_ (qv) is a web series of short horror stories based on the writings of Australian author, Rhiannon Elizabeth Irons.::Rhiannon Elizabeth Irons
